amine achergui wrote:
> Hi everyone,
> I'm now using as for mocking jmock but i want to know if it's the best
> choice.
>   

Personally.....none.

Using IntelliJ or Eclipse, its so easy to Fake an Interface or to derive 
one class from another in order to stub out its methods, the Mock 
frameworks just aren't worth it.

This is especially true if you are new to TDD or Unit testing.

YMMV

Andrew
